001package org.relationlearn.test;
002
003import java.util.Iterator;
004import java.util.Map;
005import java.util.Map.Entry;
006import org.relationlearn.model.ArgumentNode;
007import org.relationlearn.model.RelationDigraph;
008import org.relationlearn.util.io.DLVFileGenerator;
009import org.relationlearn.util.io.DOTFileGenerator;
010import org.relationlearn.util.io.InputParser;
011import org.relationlearn.util.io.OutputGenerator;
012import org.relationlearn.util.io.XMLFileGenerator;
013import org.relationlearn.util.io.XMLFileParser;
014
015/**
016 *
017 * @author Dídac
018 */
019public class TestFileOutputGeneration {
020    
021    private static final String PATH = "test_files\\debatepedia\\";
022    private static final String DOT_PATH = "test_files\\dot_files\\";
023    private static final String DLV_PATH = "test_files\\dlv_files\\";
024    private static final String FILE_TRAIN = "debatepedia_train.xml";
025    private static final String FILE_TEST = "debatepedia_test.xml";
026    private static final String FILE_OUT = "debatepedia_out.xml";
027    private static final String BASE_OUT = "output";
028    
029    public static void main(String args[]) {
030        InputParser xfp = new XMLFileParser();
031        Map<String, RelationDigraph> relsTable = xfp.parseInput(PATH + FILE_TRAIN);
032        /*System.out.println("****************");
033        System.out.println(relsTable.size());
034        System.out.println("****************");
035        for(Entry<String, RelationDigraph> rd : relsTable.entrySet()) {
036            System.out.println("Graph: " +rd.getKey());
037            Iterator<ArgumentNode> it = rd.getValue().iterator();
038            System.out.println(it.hasNext());
039            while(it.hasNext()) {
040                System.out.println(it.next().toString());
041            }
042        }*/
043        // Generate NoDE XML output from relsTable
044        OutputGenerator out = new XMLFileGenerator();
045        out.generateOutput(relsTable,PATH + FILE_OUT);
046        // Generate DOT files for each graph contained in relsTable
047        out = new DOTFileGenerator();
048        out.generateOutput(relsTable, DOT_PATH + BASE_OUT);
049        // Generate DLV files for each graph contained in relsTable
050        out = new DLVFileGenerator();
051        out.generateOutput(relsTable, DLV_PATH + BASE_OUT);
052    }
053}
